autoplay.title: Autoplay
autoplay.description: Specifies that the audio will start playing as soon as it is ready

controls.title: Controls
controls.description: Specifies that audio controls should be displayed (such as a play/pause button etc.)

loop.title: Loop
loop.description: Specifies that the audio will start over again, every time it is finished

preload.title: Preload
preload.description: Specifies if and how the author thinks the audio should be loaded when the page loads

src.title: URL
src.description: Specifies the URL of the audio file
